<html><body><div><div class="entry-content single-content">
<p align="center"><span><strong><span>In Occupied Palestine</span></strong></span></p>
<p align="center"><span><span><b>Zionism in practice</b></span></span></p>
<p align="center"><span><strong><span><span><b>Israel’s Daily Toll on Palestinian Life, Limb, Liberty and </b></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><b>Land</b></span></span></strong></span></p>
<p align="center"><span><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>Sanction Israel</b></span></span></span></strong></span></p>
<p align="center"><span><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>Gaza</b></span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>‘s</b></span></span></span></strong><b> </b><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>growing </b></span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>d</b></span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>eath</b></span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>,</b></span></span></span></strong><b> </b><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>injury </b></span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>and </b></span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>sickness</b></span></span></span></strong></span></p>
<p align="center"><span><a href="https://www-nad-ps.translate.goog/ar/violations-reports/%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%AA%D9%82%D8%A7%D8%B1%D9%8A%D8%B1-%D8%A7%D9%84%D9%8A%D9%88%D9%85%D9%8A%D8%A9/%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%AA%D9%82%D8%A7%D8%B1%D9%8A%D8%B1-%D8%A7%D9%84%D9%8A%D9%88%D9%85%D9%8A%D8%A9-%D8%B4%D8%A8%D8%A7%D8%B7-08-2026?_x_tr_sl=auto&amp;_x_tr_tl=en&amp;_x_tr_hl=en-GB" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow" data-saferedirecturl="https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www-nad-ps.translate.goog/ar/violations-reports/%25D8%25A7%25D9%2584%25D8%25AA%25D9%2582%25D8%25A7%25D8%25B1%25D9%258A%25D8%25B1-%25D8%25A7%25D9%2584%25D9%258A%25D9%2588%25D9%2585%25D9%258A%25D8%25A9/%25D8%25A7%25D9%2584%25D8%25AA%25D9%2582%25D8%25A7%25D8%25B1%25D9%258A%25D8%25B1-%25D8%25A7%25D9%2584%25D9%258A%25D9%2588%25D9%2585%25D9%258A%25D8%25A9-%25D8%25B4%25D8%25A8%25D8%25A7%25D8%25B7-08-2026?_x_tr_sl%3Dauto%26_x_tr_tl%3Den%26_x_tr_hl%3Den-GB&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1770715726954000&amp;usg=AOvVaw2Tt01XYlrdf-AUZLRvg85Z"><strong><span><span lang="en-GB">08:00, </span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB">0</span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB">7</span></span></strong> <strong><span><span lang="en-GB">Febr</span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB">uary 2026 until 08:00, </span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB">0</span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB">8</span></span></strong> <strong><span><span lang="en-GB">February</span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB"> 2026</span></span></strong></a></span></p>
<p><span><strong><span><span lang="en-GB">T</span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB">he total numbers of killed and wounded in Gaza by Israel </span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB">since 7 October 2023</span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB"> are</span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB">: </span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB">k</span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB">illed </span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB">7</span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB">2</span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB">,</span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB">027</span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB"> and </span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB">w</span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB">ounded 17</span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB">1</span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB">,</span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB">6</span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB">51</span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB">.</span></span></strong></span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><strong><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>The daily average number of men, women and children killed in Gaza</b></span></span></strong><b> </b><strong><span><span lang="en-GB">since 7 October 2023</span></span></strong> <strong><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>is at least </b></span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>84</b></span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB"><b> and, that of those injured, is more than </b></span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>20</b></span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>0</b></span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>.</b></span></span></strong></span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>S</b></span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>ince </b></span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>the </b></span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>start of </b></span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>the </b></span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>Gaza ‘ceasefire’</b></span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB"><b> the Israeli Occupation has killed </b></span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>768</b></span></span></span></strong><b> </b><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>Palestinians</b></span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB"><b> and </b></span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>injured </b></span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>1,</b></span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>5</b></span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>33</b></span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>.</b></span></span></span></strong></span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><strong><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>The daily average number of men, women and children killed in Gaza</b></span></span></strong><b> </b><strong><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>since the ceasefire </b></span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>is </b></span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>4</b></span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB"><b> and, that of those injured, is </b></span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>12</b></span></span></strong><strong><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>.</b></span></span></strong></span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><strong><span><span lang="en-GB"><b>A <a href="https://palestine.unwomen.org/en/what-we-do/peace-security-humanitarian-response/facts-and-figures/conflict-in-palestine" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow" data-saferedirecturl="https://www.google.com/url?q=https://palestine.unwomen.org/en/what-we-do/peace-security-humanitarian-response/facts-and-figures/conflict-in-palestine&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1770715726954000&amp;usg=AOvVaw1mlPmVXz_w89DOTeqGMfvb">UN report</a> states that, as of 14 January 2025, around 70% of those killed in Gaza were women and children.</b></span></span></strong></span></p>
<p align="center"><span><strong><span><span><span lang="zxx"><b>West Bank</b></span></span></span></strong></span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB">Since 24:00 on 7 October 2023, Israeli</span></span></span></strong> <strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB">Occupation forces have been imposing</span></span></span></strong> <strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB">a</span></span></span></strong> <strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB">complete closure o</span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB">n</span></span></span></strong> <strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB">the West Bank, preventing residents and other permit-holders from</span></span></span></strong> <strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB">entering or leaving.</span></span></span></strong> <strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB">The Israeli military also imposes severe</span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB">,</span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB"> and highly variable</span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB">,</span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="en-GB"> travel restrictions on all residents.</span></span></span></strong></span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><strong><span><span><b>Israel’s West Bank land seizures and mass expulsions</b></span></span></strong></span></p>
<p><span><a href="https://www.dropsitenews.com/p/israel-west-bank-palestinian-displacement-settlers-bedouins-jordan-valley" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow" data-saferedirecturl="https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.dropsitenews.com/p/israel-west-bank-palestinian-displacement-settlers-bedouins-jordan-valley&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1770715726954000&amp;usg=AOvVaw22anE2UvW8qGDStlQH1iD4"><strong><span lang="zxx">From </span></strong><strong><span lang="zxx"><i>Drop Site News</i></span></strong><strong><span lang="zxx">:</span></strong></a></span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><strong><span><span><span lang="zxx">Since the onset of the Gaza genocide, a staggering 10,000 Palestinians have been internally displaced across the West Bank, with entire villages emptied, dismantled, </span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="zxx">as well as</span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="zxx"> erased. This is in addition to the more than 30,000 Palestinians displaced from the Jenin, Tulkarem, and Nur Shams refugee camps</span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="zxx">,</span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="zxx"> in a large-scale Israeli military operation launched in January 2025, which marked the largest displacement of Palestinians in the West Bank in one operation since the 1967 war. Over that same period, more than 1,000 Palestinians</span></span></span></strong> <strong><span><span><span lang="zxx">—</span></span></span></strong> <strong><span><span><span lang="zxx">nearly a quarter of them children</span></span></span></strong> <strong><span><span><span lang="zxx">—</span></span></span></strong> <strong><span><span><span lang="zxx">have been killed.</span></span></span></strong></span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><strong><span><span><span lang="zxx">The foundation for the current settlement project was laid by the Oslo Accords</span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="zxx">,</span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="zxx"> signed in 1993 and 1995, which fragmented the </span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="zxx">O</span></span></span></strong><strong><span><span><span lang="zxx">ccupied West Bank into Areas A, B and C. The Palestinian Authority nominally controls civil and security affairs in Area A, and just civil affairs in Area B. These are also the two areas where most of the three million Palestinians in the West Bank live, crowded into cities, towns and villages.</span></span></span></strong></span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><strong><span><span><span lang="zxx">Though Oslo was meant to be a stepping stone to Palestinian statehood, Israel has since tripled its settler population in the West Bank over the past three decades. Currently, some 750,000 Israelis are living illegally in settlements in and around Palestinian cities and villages, which have become increasingly divided from one another in isolated cantons. </span></span></span></strong><strong><a href="https://www.dropsitenews.com/p/israel-west-bank-palestinian-displacement-settlers-bedouins-jordan-valley" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow" data-saferedirecturl="https://www.google.com/url?q=https://www.dropsitenews.com/p/israel-west-bank-palestinian-displacement-settlers-bedouins-jordan-valley&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1770715726954000&amp;usg=AOvVaw22anE2UvW8qGDStlQH1iD4">Read more . . . </a></strong></span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><span><u><b>Israeli Army attack</b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>s</b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>:</b></u></span></span> <span><span>Jerusalem – </span></span><span><span>14</span></span><span><span>:10, Israeli </span></span><span><span>O</span></span><span><span>ccupation forces raided the villages of Beit Duqqu, Qatanna and Beit Anan, fir</span></span><span><span>ing</span></span><span><span> live ammunition, rubber-coated stun grenades and tear </span></span><span><span>gas </span></span><span><span>canister</span></span><span><span>s.</span></span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><span><u><b>Israeli Army attack</b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>s</b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b> – </b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>refugee camp</b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>:</b></u></span></span> <span>Jerusalem – </span><span>16:30, Israeli forces, firing live ammunition, raided Kafr Aqab as well as the Qalandiya refugee camp.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><span><u><b>Israeli Army attack:</b></u></span></span> <span>Jerusalem – </span><span><b>00</b><b>:40</b>, the Israeli Army, firing live ammunition, raided the town of Al-Ram.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><span><u><b>Israeli Army attack – </b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>1 wounded</b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>:</b></u></span></span> <span>Jerusalem – </span><span><b>0</b><b>1:15</b>, Israeli troops, firing live ammunition, wounded and hospitalised a man, Mustafa Izzat Bani Jaber, near the Annexation Wall in Al-Ram.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><span><u><b>Israeli Army attack</b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>s</b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b> – </b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>1 </b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>youngster wounded</b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>:</b></u></span></span> <span>Ramallah – </span><span>19:20, the Israeli military, firing live ammunition, raided the Al-Amari refugee camp, wounding a 17-year-old youth, Muhammad Mahmoud Khalil.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><span><u><b>Israeli Army attack</b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>s</b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b> – </b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>home invasions</b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>:</b></u></span></span> <span>Ramallah – </span><span>Israeli soldiers, firing live ammunition, raided the village of Ras Karkar and searched several homes.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><span><u><b>Israeli Army attack:</b></u></span></span> <span>Ramallah – </span><span>21:40, Israeli Occupation forces, firing live ammunition, raided the village of Al-Nabi Saleh.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><span><u><b>Israeli Army attack</b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>s</b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b> – </b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>home invasions and vandalism</b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>:</b></u></span></span> <span>Nablus – </span><span>12:25, Israeli forces, firing live ammunition, raided the village of Jama’in, searching homes and vandalising their contents. Two residents were taken prisoner.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><span><u><b>Israeli Army attack:</b></u></span></span> <span>Nablus – </span><span>14:45, the Israeli Army, firing live ammunition, raided the Ras al-Ein area, near the village of Qusra.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><span><u><b>Israeli Army attack</b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>s</b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>:</b></u></span></span> <span>Nablus – </span><span>18:00, Israeli troops, firing live ammunition, raided the villages of Beita, Awarta and Aqraba.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><span><u><b>Israeli Army attack</b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>s</b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b> – </b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>several wounded</b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>:</b></u></span></span> <span>Nablus – </span><span>18:15, the Israeli military, firing live ammunition, raided the village of Qusra, wounding several residents.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><span><u><b>Israeli Army attack – </b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>population</b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>–</b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>control</b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>:</b></u></span></span> <span>Nablus – </span><span>19:15, Israeli soldiers, firing live ammunition, raided the village of Asira al-Qibliya and forced the shops to close.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><span><u><b>Israeli Army attack:</b></u></span></span> <span><span>Nablus – </span></span><span><span>19</span></span><span><span>:00, </span></span><span><span>armed Israeli</span></span><span><span> settlers opened fire on </span></span><span><span>resident</span></span><span><span>s and their homes</span></span><span><span>,</span></span><span><span> near the village of Qusra.</span></span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><u><b>Home invasion:</b></u></span><span> Jerusalem – </span><span>15:30, </span><span>Israeli </span><span>O</span><span>ccupation forces in</span><span>vaded the home of an</span><span> employee of the Islamic Waqf Department</span><span>:</span> <span>Bilal Al-Ajlouni.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><u><b>Home invasion</b></u></span><span><u><b> – surveillance and robbery</b></u></span><span><u><b>:</b></u></span><span> Ramallah – </span><span>12:40, Israeli forces raided the village of Aboud and invaded a house, taking prisoner a resident and seizing surveillance cameras as well as cash.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><u><b>Home invasion</b></u></span><span><u><b>s – 3 taken prisoner</b></u></span><span><u><b>:</b></u></span> <span>Nablus – </span><span><b>0</b><b>1:45</b>, the Israeli Army raided the western and central areas of the city, searching homes and taking prisoner three residents.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><u><b>Home invasion</b></u></span><span><u><b> – 2 taken prisoner</b></u></span><span><u><b>:</b></u></span> <span>Nablus – </span><span><b>0</b><b>1:45</b>, Israeli troops raided the village of Asira al-Qibliya and searched several homes, taking prisoner two residents.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><span><u><b>Home invasion</b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b> – 1 taken prisoner</b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>:</b></u></span></span><span><span> Hebron – </span></span><span><span>16</span></span><span><span>:10, </span></span><span><span>the</span></span><span><span> Israeli </span></span><span><span>military</span></span><span><span> raided the Zuweidin area</span></span><span><span> and </span></span><span><span>searched several homes</span></span><span><span>, taking prisoner</span></span> <span><span>one person.</span></span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><u><b>Israeli </b></u></span><span><u><b>police</b></u></span><u><b> </b></u><span><u><b>and settler mosque violation</b></u></span><span><u><b>:</b></u></span> <span>Jerusalem – 08:00, Israeli settlers, escorted by Occupation police, invaded the Al-Aqsa Mosque compound and molested worshippers.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><u><b>Israeli Army</b></u></span><span><u><b> – violence and injury</b></u></span><span><u><b>:</b></u></span> <span>Nablus – </span><span>21:55, Israeli troops severely beat-up three people, Muhammad Khalid Khalil Abu Ghadab, Hamza Abdul Rahman Mahmoud Bana and Abdul Rahman Mazen Hindia, leaving them with injuries over their entire bodies.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><span><u><b>Israeli Army</b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b> – violence and injury</b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>:</b></u></span></span><span><span> Hebron – </span></span><span><span>23:40, the </span></span><span><span>Israeli military </span></span><span><span>severely beat</span></span><span><span>-up</span></span> <span><span>people</span></span><span><span> in the city.</span></span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><u><b>Occupation settler </b></u></span><span><u><b>agricultural sabotage</b></u></span><span><u><b>:</b></u></span> <span>Ramallah – </span><span>0</span><span>9:40, </span><span>Israeli Occupation</span><span> settlers grazed their livestock on agricultural land</span><span>,</span><span> in the south of Al-Mughayir village.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><u><b>Occupation settler </b></u></span><span><u><b>agricultural sabotage</b></u></span><span><u><b>:</b></u></span> <span>Ramallah – </span><span>14:40, Occupation settlers grazed their livestock on agricultural land, near Jibiya village.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><u><b>Occupation settler </b></u></span><span><u><b>violence</b></u></span><span><u><b>:</b></u></span> <span>Ramallah – </span><span>15:40, Israeli settlers assaulted a man, Tawfiq Azzou Thabita, on his land in the Al-Khalla area, between Rammun and Deir Dibwan villages.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><u><b>Occupation settler </b></u></span><span><u><b>vandalism and economic sabotage</b></u></span><span><u><b>:</b></u></span> <span>Ramallah – </span><span><b>21</b><b>:10</b>, Occupation settlers invaded the Ein Samia area, near Kafr Malik, and vandalised the local water station, as well cutting electricity supply cables and destroying security cameras.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><u><b>Occupation settler </b></u></span><span><u><b>violence</b></u></span><span><u><b>:</b></u></span> <span>Jenin – </span><span>12:30, Israeli settlers assaulted a man, Hussein Mahmoud Turkman, on his land in the Wadi Shobsh area, east of the city.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><u><b>Occupation settler </b></u></span><span><u><b>pastoral sabotage</b></u></span><span><u><b>:</b></u></span> <span>Tubas – </span><span>07:07, Israeli Occupation settlers, raided the Hammamat al-Malih and destroyed 34 bags of animal feed.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><u><b>Occupation settler </b></u></span><span><u><b>agricultural sabotage</b></u></span><span><u><b>:</b></u></span> <span>Nablus – </span><span>14:45, Israeli settlers grazed their livestock on agricultural land, near the village of Duma.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><u><b>Occupation settler </b></u></span><span><u><b>violence and robbery</b></u></span><span><u><b>:</b></u></span> <span>Nablus – </span><span>18:30, Occupation settlers assaulted three residents, Abdul Rahman Hindiyeh, Hamza Bana and Muhammad Abu Ghadib, and stole their mobile phones.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><u><b>Occupation settler </b></u></span><span><u><b>vandalism</b></u></span><span><u><b>:</b></u></span><span> Salfit – </span><span>15:40, Israeli settlers damaged a motor vehicle in the Balat Susya area, north of Kafr al-Dik.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><u><b>Occupation settler </b></u><u><b>violence</b></u><u><b>:</b></u> <span>Jericho – </span><span>16:45, </span><span>Israeli Occupation</span><span> settlers </span><span>assaulted a man,</span><span> Muhammad Suleiman Salem Hreizat, near the Homesh checkpoint.</span></span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><u><b>Occupation settler </b></u></span><span><u><b>pepper-spray</b></u></span><span><u><b>ing</b></u></span><span><u><b>:</b></u></span> <span>Bethlehem – </span><span>09:55, Occupation settlers pepper-sprayed people in the village of Al-Maniya.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><u><b>Occupation settler </b></u></span><span><u><b>agricultural sabotage</b></u></span><span><u><b>:</b></u></span> <span>Hebron – </span><span>10:45, Israeli settlers grazed their livestock on agricultural land, near the town of Sa’ir.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><span><u><b>Occupation settler </b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>stoning and agricultural sabotage</b></u></span></span><span><span><u><b>:</b></u></span></span><span><span> Hebron – </span></span><span><span>17</span></span><span><span>:10, </span></span><span><span>Israeli Occupation</span></span><span><span> settlers </span></span><span><span>s</span></span><span><span>tone</span></span><span><span>d</span></span> <span><span>a </span></span><span><span>home</span></span><span><span>,</span></span> <span><span>near the town of Yatta</span></span><span><span>, vandalising property and damaging </span></span><span><span>trees and crops.</span></span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><u><b>Raid:</b></u> <span>Jerusalem – </span><span><b>21</b></span><span><b>:00</b></span><span>, </span><span>the </span><span>Israeli </span><span>Army</span><span> raided </span><span>and patrolled</span><span> town of Al-Ram.</span></span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><u><b>Raid:</b></u> <span>Jerusalem – </span><b>00</b><b>:50</b>, Israeli forces <span>raided and patrolled</span> the town of Abu Dis.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><u><b>Raid:</b></u> <span>Jerusalem – </span><b>02:45</b>, the Israeli Army <span>raided and patrolled</span> the town of Bir Nabala.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><u><b>Raid</b></u><u><b> </b></u><span><u><b>– 1 taken prisoner</b></u></span><u><b>:</b></u> <span>Ramallah – </span>evening, Israeli troops <span>raided and patrolled</span> the town of Birzeit<span>, taking </span><span>prisoner one person.</span></span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><u><b>Raid:</b></u> <span>Ramallah – </span>09:15, the Israeli military <span>raided and patrolled</span> the village of Sinjil.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><u><b>Raid:</b></u> <span>Ramallah – </span>11:30, Israeli soldiers <span>raided and patrolled</span> the village of Al-Mughayir.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><u><b>Raid:</b></u> <span>Ramallah – </span>19:00, Israeli Occupation force <span>raided and patrolled</span> the village of Aboud.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><u><b>Raid</b></u><u><b> </b></u><span><u><b>– violence and inju</b></u></span><span><u><b>r</b></u></span><span><u><b>y</b></u></span><u><b>:</b></u> <span>Ramallah – </span><b>21</b><b>:50</b>, Israeli forces, at a checkpoint near the town of Taybeh, assaulted a man, Anas Azmi Abdul Rahman Yousef, breaking his leg and imposing other injuries.</span></p>
<p align="justify"><span><u><b>Raid:</b></u> <span>Jenin – </span><b>00:55</b>, the Israeli Army <span>raided and patrolled</span> the village of Rumana.</span></p>
